name: Catan
description: A game of building settlements and roads on a board with hexagonal tiles.

name: Carcassonne
description: A tile-placement game where players build medieval landscapes with cities, roads, and fields, scoring points for completed features.

name: Splendor
description: A strategic card game where players collect gems to purchase development cards and attract nobles, building the most prestigious jewelry business.

name: Dixit
description: A creative storytelling game where players give clues about their cards using words, sounds, or gestures, while others try to guess the correct card.

name: Dutch Blitz
description: A Vonderful Goot Game

name: Anomia
description: A fast-paced card game where players race to name examples of categories when matching symbols appear, testing quick thinking and reflexes.

name: Set
description: A real-time pattern recognition game where players race to find sets of three cards that share or differ in color, shape, number, and shading.

name: Poker
description: An early version of Balatro

name: Splendor
description: A strategic card game where players collect gems to purchase development cards and attract nobles, building the most prestigious jewelry business.

name: Ultimate Werewolf
description: A social deduction game where players are secretly assigned roles as villagers or werewolves, with villagers trying to identify and eliminate the werewolves.

name: Codenames
description: A word association game where teams compete to identify their agents using one-word clues given by their spymaster.

name: Steampunk Rally
description: A racing game where players build and modify their own steampunk machines using dice and cards, competing to cross the finish line first.

name: Bang!
description: A spaghetti western-themed card game where players take on hidden roles and try to eliminate their targets while protecting their allies.

name: Coup
description: A bluffing game where players use influence to eliminate rivals while trying to maintain their own influence in a dystopian future.

name: Power Grid
description: A strategic game where players compete to build the most efficient power grid by buying power plants, resources, and connecting cities.

name: Agricola
description: A farming simulation game where players build and manage their own farm, growing crops, raising animals, and expanding their family.

name: Monopoly Deal
description: A fast-paced card game version of Monopoly where players collect property sets and use action cards to steal from opponents.

name: Pandemic: The Cure
description: A cooperative dice game where players work together to stop the spread of deadly diseases by finding cures before time runs out.

name: Ticket to Ride: Europe
description: A train adventure game where players collect cards to claim railway routes across Europe, connecting cities and completing destination tickets.

name: Puerto Rico
description: A strategic game where players develop plantations, construct buildings, and ship goods to earn victory points in colonial Puerto Rico.

name: Dominion
description: A deck-building game where players start with identical small decks and gradually build their deck by buying cards from a shared pool.

name: Labyrinth
description: A maze game where players shift the board to create paths, collecting treasures while trying to block opponents from reaching their goals.

name: Love Letter
description: A quick deduction game where players try to deliver their love letter to the princess while preventing others from doing the same.

name: Scrabble
description: A classic word game where players use letter tiles to create words on a board, scoring points based on letter values and premium squares.

name: Chess
description: A strategic two-player game where players maneuver their pieces to capture the opponent's king while protecting their own.

name: Jungle Speed
description: A fast-paced reaction game where players race to grab the totem when matching symbols appear, testing reflexes and observation skills.

name: Stratego
description: A two-player strategy game where players position their hidden army pieces to capture the opponent's flag while protecting their own.

name: Avalon
description: A social deduction game where players take on roles of loyal servants of Arthur or undetected minions of Mordred, trying to complete quests or sabotage them.

name: Letter Jam
description: A cooperative word game where players work together to deduce their hidden letters and form words, helping each other with clues.

name: Machi Koro
description: A city-building dice game where players roll dice to activate their establishments and earn coins to build landmarks.

name: Freelancers
description: A fantasy-themed worker placement game where players take on quests, hire adventurers, and manage resources to build their reputation.

name: Stella: Dixit Universe
description: Players confront each other with word-images association and risk management choicess.

name: Snake Oil
description: A creative party game where players combine word cards to create ridiculous products and pitch them to a rotating customer.

name: Android: Netrunner
description: An asymmetric card game where one player is a powerful corporation protecting their servers while the other is a hacker trying to break in.

name: Bohnanza
description: A trading and negotiation game where players plant, harvest, and trade different types of beans to earn the most money.

name: Between Two Castles
description: A tile-drafting game where players work with their neighbors to build castles, scoring points based on the castles they helped build.

name: Shadow Hunters
description: A hidden role game where players are divided into three teams: Shadows, Hunters, and Neutrals, each with their own victory conditions.

name: Concept
description: A communication game where players use icons on a board to give clues about words or phrases without speaking.

name: Spyfall
description: A social deduction game where players ask each other questions to determine who is the spy, while the spy tries to blend in and identify the location.

name: 7 Wonders Duel
description: A two-player card drafting game where players build their civilization through military, scientific, and cultural development.

name: Boss Monster
description: A card game where players build dungeons to attract and defeat heroes, competing to be the most successful villain.

name: Scattergories The Card Game
description: A card-based version of the classic word game where players race to list unique items in categories that start with a specific letter.

name: Legend of the Five Rings
description: A strategic card game set in the fantasy world of Rokugan, where players take on the roles of samurai clans competing for honor and influence.

name: Mr. Jack Pocket
description: A compact deduction game where one player is Jack the Ripper trying to escape, while the other player uses detectives to identify and capture him.

name: Mechs vs. Minions
description: A cooperative programming game where players control mechs to defend against waves of minions, using command cards to plan their actions.

name: Robo Rally
description: A chaotic racing game where players program their robots to navigate a factory floor filled with obstacles and other players' robots.

name: ArchRavels
description: A tile-laying game where players create interconnected knitting patterns, scoring points for completed designs and special combinations.

name: Play Nine
description: A golf-themed card game where players try to get the lowest score by strategically playing and replacing cards in their hand.

name: That's Not a Hat
description: A memory and bluffing game where players pass cards face-down, trying to remember what they're passing while convincing others of their claims.
